events.name: FREE Utlimate TECH Camp preview/Robotics Coding & 3Dprinting - Atom Robots
events.description:
Atom Robots presents the March 2017 holidays ULTIMATE TECH Camp for young ones.
check us out on Instagram @atomrobots
Visit us for a FREE preview;
5th March Sunday 2pm to 2:45pm
OR
12th March Sunday 2pm to 2:45pm
VENUE Atom Robots CentreKatong Plaza, 1 Brooke Road, #02-36Singapore 429979



DATES  for the actual paid camp13th to 17th March, Monday to FridayChoose one or more cool TECH courses :
Scratch Coding Beginner's (5 x 2 hours each)
Lego Mindstorms Robotics Beginner's (5 x 2 hours each)
3D Printing - Beginner's (5 lessons x 2 hours each)
download our full course descriptions here
http://atomrobots.com/ultimate-tech-camp
VENUE Atom Robots CentreKatong Plaza, 1 Brooke Road, #02-36Singapore 429979
events.location: Atom Robots Centre - Katong Plaza, Katong Plaza, 1 Brooke Road, #02-36, Atom Robots Centre, singapore 429979
